author: indigolabs
title: Cardano Multi-DEX SDK
description: Developers will need an open-source SDK to interface with Cardano DEX's in a seamless manner.
solution: Indigo Labs will develop a Typescript SDK that allows developers to interact with Cardano DEXs, and boosting the Cardano DeFi ecosystem.
experience: Team of 3 Haskell devs, 1 web dev (Plutus experience), 1 marketing lead, and 2 tech consultants. Top 20 Plutus repository contributors.
